name: Slide
info:
# Slide

Fill in your username/password

To start:

Use an inject node with a timestamp, select "overview".

This will produce an output with all available slides in the household.

Determine the slide ID and fill in the form with the ID.

To control this slide ID, inject a number between 0 and 1 and the slide will open/close.

name: updateGlobalData
format:
<script>

(function(scope) {

 scope.$watch('msg', function (msg) { //watch for an incoming NR msg
    console.log(updateGlobalData(msg))
     
 })
})(scope);
</script>

name: Nhận lệnh
format:
<script>


function updateGlobalData(msg) {
    var i = 0;
    $("svg title").each(function() {
    	var $this = $(this)
    	var option = $this.html()
    	console.log("svg count", i++)
    	try {
        	option = JSON.parse(option)
    		console.log(option)
    		var parent = $this.parent()
    		var value
    		switch (option.type) {
    		    case "title": {
    		        //alert(option.id)
    		        if (option.id) {
    		            parent.find("tspan").html(msg.payload[option.id])
    		        }
     		        break;
    		    }
    		    case "img": {
    		        if (option.id) {
    		            parent.attr("xlink:href", 'data:image/gif;base64,'+msg.payload[option.id])
    		            //xlink:href="
    		        }
    		        break;
    		    }
    		} 
    		if (value == option.value) {
    		    parent.show()
    		} else {
    		    parent.hide()
    		}
    	} catch(e) {
    		console.log("Error", option, e)
    	}
    })
}
function updateSvgData(msg) {
    console.log("updateSvgData", msg)
    $("svg title").each(function() {
    	var $this = $(this)
    	var option = $this.html()
    	try {
        	option = JSON.parse(option)
    		console.log(option)
    		var parent = $this.parent()
    		var value
    		option.flow = option.flow || 0
    		option.bit = option.bit || 0
    		console.log(msg.payload[option.flow].state)
    		msg.payload[option.flow].state = parseInt(msg.payload[option.flow].state, 10)
    		switch (option.type) {
    		    case "bit": {
    		        value = msg.payload[option.flow].state
    		        console.log("bit", option.bit, msg.payload[option.flow].state)
                    value = (value >> option.bit) & 1
    		        break;
    		    }
    		    case "integer": {
    		        value = msg.payload[option.flow].state || 0
                
    		        break;
    		    }
    		} 
    		if (value == option.value) {
    		    parent.show()
    		} else {
    		    parent.hide()
    		}
    	} catch(e) {
    		console.log("Error", option, e)
    	}
    })
    return true
}
var sendNodered = this.scope.send
</script>

name: Cài tên haiz
format:
<script>
    (function(scope) {
        $(document).ready(function() {
            var giaiFrom = 3
            var giai = []
            var namesList = []
            console.log('Position 1');
        // Change to false if you don't want a timer
            const showTimer = true;
            
            // Set timer countdown time here in minutes : seconds format
            const time = 99 + ":" + 00;
            
            console.dir(scope);
            var i = 0;
            var x = 0;
            var intervalHandle = null;
            
            // Optional countdown timer
            // Add zero in front of numbers < 10
            function checkSecond(sec) {
              if (sec < 10 && sec >= 0) {
                sec = "0" + sec;
              }
              if (sec < 0) {
                sec = "59";
              }
              return sec;
            }
            
            const startTimer = function () {
              const presentTime = timer.innerHTML;
              const timeArray = presentTime.split(/[:]+/);
              let m = timeArray[0];
              let s = checkSecond(timeArray[1] - 1);
            
              if (s == 59) {
                m = m - 1;
              }
              if (m < 0) {
                timesUp.style.display = "block";
              }
            
              timer.innerHTML = m + ":" + s;
            
              setTimeout(startTimer, 1000);
            };
            
            // Start or stop the name shuffle on button click
            
            
           
        
            
            var startButton = document.getElementById('startButton');
                
            const stopButton = document.getElementById('stopButton');
            const headerOne = document.getElementById('headerNames');
            const timesUp = document.getElementById('timesUp');
            const timerWrapper = document.getElementById('timerWrapper');
            const timer = document.getElementById('timer');
            
            
            
            startButton.addEventListener('click', function () {
              this.style.display = "none";
              stopButton.style.display = "block";
              intervalHandle = setInterval(function () {
                headerNames.textContent = namesList[i++ % namesList.length].TEN;
                
              }, 20);
              if (showTimer === true) {
                timerWrapper.classList.remove('visible');
              }
            });
            stopButton.addEventListener('click', function () {
              this.style.display = "none";
              startButton.style.display = "block";
              clearInterval(intervalHandle);
              timer.innerHTML = time;
              if (showTimer === true) {
                timerWrapper.classList.add('visible');
              }
              $("#giai" + giaiFrom).html('Giải ' + giaiFrom + ': ' + headerNames.textContent)
              giaiFrom--
              startTimer();
            });
            
            document.body.onkeyup = function(e) {
	if (e.keyCode == 32) {
		if (x%2===0) {
			startButton.style.display = "none";
			stopButton.style.display = "block";
			intervalHandle = setInterval(function () {
			    var name = namesList[i++ % namesList.length]
				headerNames.textContent = name.TEN;
				for (var id = 0; id < 9; id++)
				    document.getElementById('sub_number' + id).textContent = name.VAITRO[id]
			}, 5);
			if (showTimer===true) {
				timerWrapper.classList.remove('visible');
			}
		} else {
			startButton.style.display = "block";
			stopButton.style.display = "none";
			clearInterval(intervalHandle);
			timer.innerHTML = time;
			if (showTimer===true) {
				timerWrapper.classList.add('visible');
			}
			startTimer();
		}
		x++; 
	}
} 
            
            
            scope.$watch('msg.payload', function(data) {
                
                console.log('msg.payload',data)
                namesList = []
                for (var i = 0; i < data.length; i++) {
                    namesList.push(data[i])
                }
                
                // Add list of names here
                
                
                
                // Default variables
            },true);
        });
    })(scope);
</script>

label: Xuất excel để kiểm tra cuối ngày

format:
<script>

(function(scope) {

 scope.$watch('msg', function (msg) { //watch for an incoming NR msg
    if (msg.download_excel == 1) {
        window.location='/excel.xlsx'
    }
     
 })
})(scope);
</script>
